message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $140. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $140 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position but I value the product at a higher price point.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $130?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product.
